title: EastEnders spoilers: Who dies in huge Christmas stunt as Phil takes revenge?
text:
It looks like the feverish affair between Sharon Mitchell (Letitia Dean) and Keanu Taylor (Danny Walters) is about to end with a different kind of bang as Danny has promised some major action, drama and stunts as the truth comes out this Christmas.

EastEnders always delivers the goods at Christmas time and this year looks set to be no different, with the long running affair arc set to finally explode. As Phil (Steve McFadden) discovers the truth, life will never be the same and Keanu will end up in serious danger.

Show boss Kate Oates has already promised some big surprises and twists for the inevitable showdown, hinting that not everything will go the way that viewers suspect. But given Walford’s high festive mortality rate, could Phil go as far as murder to make Keanu pay for impregnating his wife and also betraying his daughter Louise (Tilly Keeper)?

Advertisement

Advertisement

The star told Digital Spy at the Inside Soap Awards: ‘The whole Sheanu story has been bubbling for a long, long time. It’s about to get much more serious, much more darker and much more interesting – to watch, to perform and to be a part of.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

‘It’s going to be a fantastic Christmas. It’s explosive, big emotions, big stunts – like good, classic Christmas EastEnders style.’

At the moment, Sharon is being blackmailed about her and Keanu’s baby secret while an oblivious Louise looks forward to starting a family with Keanu. Having got her hands on DNA results, Mel Owen (Tamzin Outhwaite) is making Sharon suffer with endless demands, knowing that she could destroy the Mitchells at any point.

As Sharon makes Keanu aware of what Mel is up to, the drama will culminate in a high speed car chase that will see Mel blast out of Walford for good. But will she be the catalyst for the whole affair coming to light before she goes?

description: Christmas is going to go off with a bang!
